description: Get the necessary ingredients and equipment to make tea.
name: Prepare for making tea
pseudocode:
1. Gather tea bag or loose tea.
2. Get a mug.
3. Get water and a kettle.

name: Make tea
pseudocode:
1. Boil water in the kettle.
2. Put tea bag or loose tea in the mug.
3. Pour hot water into the mug.
4. Steep for the desired amount of time.
5. Remove tea bag or strain loose tea.
6. Add milk and sugar (optional).
